definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: brier (NH id.; Aram. [[חִדְקָא]] Löw:p. 147, No. 104; cf. Ar. h.adaqa a kind of night-shade, v. Lane:532);—[[טוֹבָם כַּחֵדֶק]] Mic 7:4 the best of them (si vera l.) is like the brier (‖[[יׇשָׁר מִמְּסוּכָה]]); [[דֶּרֶח עָחֵל כִּמְשֻׂכַת חָָדֶק]] Pr 15:19 the way of a sluggard is like a brier-hedge.
